# Coluna preenchida

```{r eval=TRUE,  echo=FALSE,cache=FALSE,  comment=FALSE, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}

# Carregar os pacotes -----------------------

library(tidyverse)
library(highcharter)
library(shiny)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

# Dados --------------------------------

dados_plot <- data.frame(
  ano = c(2017:2020),
  valor = c(120, 70, 58, 100),
  valor1 = c(100, 60, 58, 70)
)


fluidPage(
  fluidRow(
    column(
      width = 12,
      
      h4(style="font-weight: bold;", "GrÃ¡fico exemplo - Coluna preenchida "),
      
      highchart() %>%
        hc_add_series(
          data = dados_plot,
          type = "column",
          name = "Valor1",
          pointPadding = 0.2,
          color = 'rgba(136, 145, 194, 1)',
          hcaes(
            x = as.character(ano), 
            y = valor1
          ),
          tooltip = list(pointFormat = '<span style="color:{series.color}">\u25CF</span>{series.name}: <b>{point.valor:.,2f}</b>')
        ) %>% 
        hc_add_series(
          data = dados_plot,
          type = "column",
          name = "Valor",
          pointPadding = 0.4,
          color = 'rgba(0, 7, 45,.9)',
          hcaes(
            x = as.character(ano), 
            y = valor
          )
        ) %>%
        hc_xAxis(categories = as.character(dados_plot$ano)) %>% 
        hc_yAxis(title = list(text = "Valor"), lineColor ="#f7f7f7",  gridLineColor="#f4f4f4") %>% 
        hc_plotOptions(
          column = list(
            grouping = FALSE,
            shadow = FALSE,
            borderWidth = 0
          ),
          line = list(dataLabels = list(enabled = TRUE))
        )
    )
  )
  
)

```
